languages.text:
{n}Ulfar produces a knife inscribed with scarlet runes. Picking up a rock from the ground, he begins to scratch the rock's sharp edge across the blade, etching a name. His powerful voice rumbles:{/n}
"Hear now the saga
of the Baleful Howl pack,
Proud warriors of Fenris,
Vlka Fenryka..."

traits.locale_text:

of the Famehungry pack,

languages.text:
{n}乌尔法掏出了一把刻着猩红色符文的小刀。他从地上捡起一块石头，用岩石锋利的边缘划过刀刃，刻下了一个名字。他以铿锵有力的声音开始颂唱。{/n}
“怒嚎者狼群的史诗，
如今在此唱响。
他们是芬里斯骄傲的勇士，
芬里斯之狼……”
languages.original_text:
{n}Ulfar produces a knife inscribed with scarlet runes. Picking up a rock from the ground, he begins to scratch the rock's sharp edge across the blade, etching a name. His powerful voice rumbles:{/n}
"Hear now the saga
of the Baleful Howl pack,
Proud warriors of Fenris,
Vlka Fenryka..."

traits.locale_text:
{n}乌尔法掏出了一把刻着猩红色符文的小刀。他从地上捡起一块石头，用岩石锋利的边缘划过刀刃，刻下了一个名字。他以铿锵有力的声音开始颂唱。{/n}
“渴名者狼群的史诗，
如今在此唱响。
他们是芬里斯骄傲的勇士，
芬里斯之狼……”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
{n}ウルファーは緋色のルーンが刻まれたナイフを取り出す。地面に落ちている岩を拾い上げると、その岩のとがった縁で刃をひっかき始め、銘を彫る。ウルファーの力強い声が響き渡る。{/n}
「これよりサーガを聴け
破滅の咆哮の群れが紡ぎし、
フェンリスの誉れ高き戦士、
ヴルカ・フェンリカ…」
languages.original_text:
{n}Ulfar produces a knife inscribed with scarlet runes. Picking up a rock from the ground, he begins to scratch the rock's sharp edge across the blade, etching a name. His powerful voice rumbles:{/n}
"Hear now the saga
of the Baleful Howl pack,
Proud warriors of Fenris,
Vlka Fenryka..."

traits.locale_text:
{n}ウルファーは緋色のルーンが刻まれたナイフを取り出す。地面に落ちている岩を拾い上げると、その岩のとがった縁で刃をひっかき始め、銘を彫る。ウルファーの力強い声が響き渡る。{/n}
「これよりサーガを聴け
破滅の咆哮の群れが紡ぎし、
フェンリスの誉れ高き戦士、
ヴルカ・フェンリカ…」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
{n}Ulfar saca un cuchillo inscrito con runas escarlatas. Recoge una piedra del suelo y empieza a frotar su lateral contra la hoja, tallando un nombre. Su poderosa voz retumba:{/n}
«Escuchad ahora la saga
del Aullido Torvo,
jauría de guerreros de Fenris,
Vlka Fenryka...».
languages.original_text:
{n}Ulfar produces a knife inscribed with scarlet runes. Picking up a rock from the ground, he begins to scratch the rock's sharp edge across the blade, etching a name. His powerful voice rumbles:{/n}
"Hear now the saga
of the Baleful Howl pack,
Proud warriors of Fenris,
Vlka Fenryka..."

traits.locale_text:
{n}Ulfar saca un cuchillo inscrito con runas escarlatas. Recoge una piedra del suelo y empieza a frotar su lateral contra la hoja, tallando un nombre. Su poderosa voz retumba:{/n}
«Escuchad ahora la saga
de los Hambrientos de Fama,
jauría de guerreros de Fenris,
Vlka Fenryka...».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
{n}Ulfar sort un couteau couvert de runes écarlates, puis ramasse une pierre aux bords tranchants qu'il utilise pour graver un nom sur la lame. Sa voix puissante entonne :{/n}
« Écoutez la saga
de la meute des Hurleurs sanguinaires,
fiers guerriers de Fenris,
Vlka Fenryka... »
languages.original_text:
{n}Ulfar produces a knife inscribed with scarlet runes. Picking up a rock from the ground, he begins to scratch the rock's sharp edge across the blade, etching a name. His powerful voice rumbles:{/n}
"Hear now the saga
of the Baleful Howl pack,
Proud warriors of Fenris,
Vlka Fenryka..."

traits.locale_text:
{n}Ulfar sort un couteau couvert de runes écarlates, puis ramasse une pierre aux bords tranchants qu'il utilise pour graver un nom sur la lame. Sa voix puissante entonne :{/n}
« Écoutez la saga
de la meute des Dévoreurs de gloire,
fiers guerriers de Fenris,
Vlka Fenryka... »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
{n}Ulfar zieht ein Messer hervor, das mit roten Runen verziert ist. Er hebt einen Stein vom Boden auf und ritzt mit dessen scharfer Kante einen Namen in die Klinge. Seine mächtige Stimme grollt:{/n}
"Höret nun die Saga
des Rudels der Baleful Howl,
stolzer Krieger aus Fenris,
Vlka Fenryka ..."
languages.original_text:
{n}Ulfar produces a knife inscribed with scarlet runes. Picking up a rock from the ground, he begins to scratch the rock's sharp edge across the blade, etching a name. His powerful voice rumbles:{/n}
"Hear now the saga
of the Baleful Howl pack,
Proud warriors of Fenris,
Vlka Fenryka..."

traits.locale_text:
{n}Ulfar holt ein Messer mit roten Runen hervor. Er hebt einen Stein vom Boden auf und ritzt damit einen Namen in die Klinge hinein. Seine kraftvolle Stimme ertönt:{/n}
"Hört nun die Saga
des Famehungry-Rudels,
stolze Krieger von Fenris,
Vlka Fenryka ..."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
{n}Ulfar, kırmızı rünlerle kaplı bir bıçak çıkarıyor. Yerden bir taş alarak taşın keskin köşelerini bıçağıyla yontup bir isim kazıyor. Güçlü sesiyle yeri göğü inletiyor.{/n}
"Fenrisli onur savaşçı
Sürümüz Uğursuz Uluma'nın
Destanına kulak verin.
Vlka Fenryka..."
languages.original_text:
{n}Ulfar produces a knife inscribed with scarlet runes. Picking up a rock from the ground, he begins to scratch the rock's sharp edge across the blade, etching a name. His powerful voice rumbles:{/n}
"Hear now the saga
of the Baleful Howl pack,
Proud warriors of Fenris,
Vlka Fenryka..."

traits.locale_text:
{n}Ulfar, kırmızı rünlerle kaplı bir bıçak çıkarıyor. Yerden bir taş alarak taşın keskin köşelerini bıçağıyla yuvarlayarak bir isim kazıyor. Güçlü sesiyle yeri göğü inletiyor:{/n}
"Kulak verin destanına
Uğursuz Uluma sürüsünün.
Fenris'in onurlu savaşçıları
Vlka Fenryka..."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
